thread.title: Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC Ocean Cargo Division Celebrates 1-Year Anniversary
thread.title_full: Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC Ocean Cargo Division Celebrates 1-Year Anniversary - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC Ocean Cargo Division Celebrates 1-Year Anniversary
text:
Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC; Continental Underwriters, Ltd.
COVINGTON, La. , Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC (FGH) with its subsidiary company Continental Underwriters, Ltd. , a National Marine Insurance coverage and service leader, recently announced the one-year corporate anniversary of its Ocean Cargo Division. Twelve months after its launch in September 2014 , Continental Underwriters proudly serves a growing client base delivering extraordinary value to customers across the globe.
"We would like to thank our many partners for the successes that we have achieved together during the past twelve months," said H. Elder Brown, Jr. , President and CEO of FGH . "Our partners' success has, and always will be, our success. This milestone is a testament to our group's unrelenting commitment to providing our partners with the industry-leading resources necessary to propel their business forward."
FGH 's Ocean Cargo division is located at 2300 N. Barrington Road, Suite 400, Hoffman Estates, IL 60169. The group plans to add more ocean cargo positions in the near future.
About the Company:
Headquartered in Covington, Louisiana , Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC is a leading provider of primary, excess, ocean cargo, and inland marine insurance. Specializing in hull and maritime liability coverages (P&I) for vessel owners, ship builders, terminal operators, fleet operators, stevedores, cargo handlers, marine contractors and a variety of other maritime insurance products. FGH provides underwriting, broker services, claims management and loss control assistance for its maritime clients. The Company's subsidiary, Continental Underwriters, Ltd., ( www.cultd.com ) also represents a number of highly rated marine insurers.
